channel.title: Making moparscape server
channel.description:
Hey guys:) Sorry about me English Me English isn't not so good, because I come from Holland(The Netherlands)
But what I want to ask is:
How to make a server with the 127.0.0.1 ip? :confused:
I would like make me own server ------------------------------------------- Please dont use rare codes... I dont understand that kind of codes :|

item.title: Making moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Start by downloading the latest Java. Then download a source (Testscape personally recommended). To make it no-ip, go to www.no-ip.com
The register and log in. Go to “My no-ip” go to “host” click “add” and fill out the information. DO NOT CHANGE THE IP!! Open your source and click runserver.bat. This should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Making moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @MazterSeven MazterSeven
item.description:
@MazterSeven wrote:

Sick…

First, download a source. Testscape best

Then open the compile, the option R

If u don’t get a options shit, click runserver…

If nothing is working fix JD6

If not working check the tutorials…
its not kinda hard!!

Read full topic

item.title: Making moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @pk_idiot4 pk idiot4
item.description:
@pk_idiot4 wrote:

runescapekid:

well 127.0.0.1 is the basic server. nobody can log into this as it is default. if you want other people to play it then you need a hamachi server or no-ip. look on tutorials and it explains everything

I dont understand those tuts… and strange codes that you need to relace with other codes :-S, so can you help me a little bit?

but how to make a server withouth paying for a server?

Read full topic
